data.eml:eml: Sierolomorpha sogdiana spec. nov. from Central Asia, and a World catalogue of Sierolomorphidae (Hymenoptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lelej, Arkady S., Mokrousov, Mikhail V. (2015): Sierolomorpha sogdiana spec. nov. from Central Asia, and a World catalogue of Sierolomorphidae (Hymenoptera). Zootaxa 4018 (4): 593-599, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4018.4.8
